sentences.sContent: Roberts has spent much of his working life collating the data on which the study was based.
sentences.sCn: 罗伯茨花费很多工作时间来整理检点数据，以此作为该研究的基础。

remMethod.val: col(共同) + lat(搬运) + e → 一起搬运 → 对照； 核对

words.tran: 校对；斋日的点心；牧师职务

trans.tranCn: 对照； 核对； 整理
trans.tranOther: to gather information together, examine it carefully, and compare it with other information to find any differences
